author: craigmcc
msg: Make it possible for <logic:iterate> to iterate over arrays of Java
primitives, as well as all the other previous possibilities.  Add a
test case to the exercise suite to prove that it works.
Submitted by:	Martin Rose <martin.rose at gsullivan.com>

author: craigmcc
msg: The "key" attribute of the <exception> element should be marked as required
in the DTD for struts-config.xml files.
Submitted by:	Chuck Cavaness <chuckcavaness at mediaone.net>

author: craigmcc
msg: Submitted by:	Bryan Field-Elliot <bryan at netmeme.org>

author: craigmcc
msg: Add missing </head> element to example page.
Submitted by:	Bryan Field-Elliot <bryan at netmeme.org>

author: martinc
msg: Don't use deprecated Struts methods in web apps included with Struts.
I didn't touch Tiles, since it has a life of its own independent of Struts.
Cedric is in a much better position to know whether these should be changed
